title: Herd health coordination
text: Herd health coordination. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. I clean the barn after milking and store the tools. We plan the day: planting, irrigation, and equipment checks. The sun is low, and the soil is cool and soft. In Canadian winter, we protect equipment from freezing. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. We apply rotational grazing protocols for pasture recovery. I feed the cows and make sure they have clean water. We sell fresh vegetables at the local market. We record yields and monitor feed intake.
